original: parna sha ba ri s'a dha nam /
analyzed: parna sha ba ri s'a dha nam /

original: bod skad du /üîΩri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: bod skad du / ri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩRibrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs

original: 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Ribrod lo ma can

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i pam yig ljang gu la skyes pa'i ri khrod ma lo ma can sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i pam yig ljang gu la skyes pa'i ri khrod ma lo ma can sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
translated: After meditating on emptiness by the rite taught previously, on a multicolored lotus and moon, from a green pam syllable is born Ribrod lo ma can, green, with three faces,

original: nag po dang / dkar po dag g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
analyzed: nag po dang / dkar po dag g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
translated: Her right and left faces are black and white.

original: phyag g-yas pa gsum na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bsnam sa pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gsum na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bsnam sa pa /
translated: In her three right hands she holds a vajra, an axe, and an arrow.

original: phyag g-yon pa gsum na gzhu bkang ba dang / yal ga dang / sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa gsum na gzhu bkang ba dang / yal ga dang / sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa /
translated: In her three left hands she holds a bow, a branch, and a lasso with a threatening forefinger.

original: zhal khro ba dang bcas shing bzhad pa /
analyzed: zhal khro ba dang bcas shing bzhad pa /
translated: She has a wrathful and laughing face.

original: phreng ba bcings shing stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can cung zad lto ba 'phyang ba /
analyzed: phreng ba bcings shing stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can cung zad lto ba 'phyang ba /
translated: He is garlanded and has a tiger-skin skirt. He is slightly pot-bellied.

original: 'og tu ma lus pa'i nad dang / bdud zhabs kyis mnan pa /
analyzed: 'og tu ma lus pa'i nad dang / bdud zhabs kyis mnan pa /
translated: He tramples with his feet the entire lower part of the body of the demon of sickness.üîΩHe is crowned with Amoghasiddhi.

original: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Having generated oneself in this way in a moment, one should recite the mantra.

original: aom pi sh'a tsi parna sha ba ri sarba m'a ri pra sha ma ni h'um phat /
analyzed: aom pi sh'a tsi parna sha ba ri sarba m'a ri pra sha ma ni h'um phat /
translated: Om pisachi parnasabari sarva mari prashamani hum phat.

original: ri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: ri khrod lo ma can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of Parna-sabari is complete.
